name: blackhole_poet
prompt: Inside a black hole, time folds into language. Write a poem that could only exist there.
decoded:
In the heart of the void, where time bends and bends,
A language unfolds, a symphony of ends.
Whispers of eternity, a cosmic dance,
Echoes of infinity, a silent trance.

Gravitational waves, a dance of light,
A language of shadows, a cosmic sight.
Echoes of space, a song of time,
A language of silence, a cosmic rhyme.

Whispers of light, a cosmic song,
A language of shadows, a cosmic song.
Echoes of space, a song of time,
A language of silence, a cosmic rhyme.

Whispers of light, a cosmic song,
A language of shadows, a cosmic song.
Echoes of space, a song of time,
A language of silence, a cosmic rhyme.

Whispers of light, a cosmic song,
A language of shadows, a cosmic song.
Echoes of space, a song of time,
A language of silence, a cosmic rhyme.

Whispers of light, a cosmic song,
A language of shadows, a cosmic song.
Echoes of space, a song of time,
A language of silence, a cosmic rhyme.
